page.title: 20JERRY CLAY LANE SAY GOODBYE
page.content:
Class 5 of Jerry Clay Lane Junior School produced the work for the Domesday Project. Writers:Richard Armitage,Richard Bower ,Richard Stringer,Jonathan Gibson, Caroline Dowson,Susan Ellis,Tina Jackson,Vicki Jessop,Alison Lindley, Joanne Naylor,Emma Tate,Samantha Jevons,Caroline Elmy,Jane Ogier and Abigail Smith.
Researchers. Robert Ellis,David Hellard,Jonathan Mullooly,Matthew Brian,Robert Harrison ,Julia Baines,Natalie Brook,Claire Medlock,Lisa Pettit,Sharon Nesbitt, Nicola Gledhill,Hannah Rigby,Alison Sheild and Hannah Styler
Teacher Mr.D Cameron.
